post.body: ok now my mac refuses to shut down hmmmmmm
yeah, although function keys refuse to work for some reason, even after i remap them still no luck.
no prob, thank you for posting lol
ahhhhh the fresh install, for geeks who cant be arsed to find the solution to the problem XD lol
PC build 14 days away, thenvista,amd & ati goodness none of this idiotic nonsense thats happening now, btw wont even read a disk. imac=& ...
FU*K this, unplugging the imac and going to bed, i figure what going on in my "really reliable and stable mac" in the morning.
it wont even let me back my stuff up before i install.......anger beginning to creep in
i feel a clean install coming up
heading to bed i'll troubleshoot the mac tomorrow
honestly that just made vista look really good.
my mac completely fooked froze,then i restarted all my keys were mapped weird then firefox crashed, then my mouse wouldnt work,..........
browsing digg for a bit before i head off to bed
am almost sure that i had a sociology homework, but can for the life of me remember what it is. O.o
configuring a budget PC.....again, getting really close to Christmas so really need to start thinking.
well got back from school, ate a sandwich now browsing teh internetz
ok well peeps im off to school, tweet ya later
really needs to shave. O.o
early morning homework is there anything better?
listening to chrstimas music :)
finally home, very long day :| going to chillax for a bit then a small ict homework
christmas songs downloaded, now heading off to school, later peeps
Santa hats FTW!!!
Home=waste of time.
well logging off, then watching a movie, then off to bed
wow, nothing to do.
ohh! the hard drive for the build just arrived :)
think the parents may surpraise me with a ipod touch there asking alot of questions about it.
Woah! just walked into my room and my eye went really weird everthings all swhirly, i think ill try to sleep it off, really weird o_O
well im creamcrackered after today so im off to bed. night tweets
just remembered, bought a little 15 piece computer tool kit (well my dad), that should make the build go a bit smoother ;)
so got psu, GH: WT w/ guitar logitech z-4 for the pc and the first bit of furniture for my room and pc components will be coming in a few :)
back from a very festive holiday shoppung session back home to unload the car and have a cup of coffee then off out again to finish off :)
im so sick of people moaning over macworl, its not a big deal, apple are still realeasing products, it doesent matter, and theres still wwdc
dont get the big fuss with this macworld thing its not like apple are closing down there just not going to one show and eveyone goes nuts :/
so glad i finally got my components ordered :)
just realized forget to order psu (duh) pick one up tomorrow from maplins :)
just something to moan about, spent £810 on ebuyer and because i live in northern ireland i couldn't even get the 5 day deliv free >:( £28:(
more epicness getting some new furniture for my room tomorrow new chair etc etc
EPIC!!!! JUST ORDERED MY PC COMPONENTS + IMAC RAM + 2ND MONITOR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :) :) :)
finally getting round 2 installing 10.5.6, the parents have instructed me to type out my wishlist so doing that once the mac is updated. :)
listening ot christmas music
getting guitar hero WT and res 2 :)
wish i could get to sleep :(
but only if everything goes to plan.
Gonna try twinkle for a day or two to see how it compares to twitterific on the touch.
Waiting for an update to orange box to finish downloading so I can FINALLY play this game after a year of waiting 39% done, oh hurry up! :).
Safari on my touch is being beatch keeps freezing, this is why I wish apple would let sombody develop a alternate browser e.g. opera mini.
hmmm i have to saythat i feel i rather wasted £30 on my g5 i mean great mouse, but damn having a corded mouse is annoying as hell!
ok a 15 minute breal very quickly turned into a 2yhour break and i have gotten a grand total of 2 pages done since 9am this morning o_O
up reasonably early so im actually starting my worl today god this is gonna take a while. o_O
rapidly approaching 1000 tweets.
nothing to tweet about today.
i hate how much work i have to do before next monday
Installing wireless card onto the of so that I can make use of the network printer that I bought yesterday
oh and everybody remember thet the topgear vietnam special is on tonight (18 mins)
god another day gone with no work at all done, right 8am tomorrow i shall start in to it.
Tweet tweet
Heading out.
Did no work today at all really news to get some done tomorrow if I want to have itall done for going back to school.
Ok got a couple YouTube videos recorded shall upload tommorow
Recording YouTube videos
wow thunderbird is being a bitch, screw it i'll just use live mail. o_O
im liking the look of live mail think ill give it a try as my email client for a couple of weeks
god ihate the UI on the gigabyte software so awful
